fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Stand guard outside a player's house, shooting anyone that tries to visit them, and preventing anyone from successfully visiting them. 1 use.
- Shoot a player. This is an attack. 3 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Anyone you attack *will* be given an immune message, unless they somehow die from your attack.
- You will learn what level of defense anyone you attack has.
